reasoning_log: The matching process relied heavily on identifying unique structural elements and specific furniture/fixture configurations mentioned in the tags. Desc_2 and Desc_16 were immediately matched to Image_2 (staircase in living area) and Image_16 (ground floor entrance/staircase) respectively. Utility rooms (Desc_15/Image_15) and the kitchen (Desc_6/Image_6) were also high-confidence matches due to unique appliances (water tank/pump) and layout (I-shaped counter). The Master Suite (Desc_3, Desc_7, Desc_8) was matched to Images 3, 7, and 8, which clearly belong to the same highly decorated area, with Image_3 showing the ensuite access and Image_8 showing the storage. The three bathrooms (Desc_5, Desc_9, Desc_14) were differentiated by the presence of a window (Image_9) versus the two similar windowless layouts (Images 5 and 14), which were assigned by exclusion. The four bedrooms (Desc_10, 11, 12, 13) were grouped based on size and shape (narrow/long for 12/13, spacious/square for 10/11) and assigned based on specific features like proximity to the bathroom (Image_10) or being a secondary view (Image_13).

matching_result_list.evidence: Standard living/dining area with basic furniture provided (已附基本家具) and white tile floor (地磚易清潔).
Clearly shows the combined living/dining area with a prominent staircase (樓梯) and railing, matching the '客廳/餐廳+樓梯' room name.
Master bedroom view showing the modern headboard, spaciousness, and the visible doorway leading to the ensuite bathroom (主臥套房配置).
Living/dining area featuring a dark partition/bar counter that achieves clear separation (餐客分區) and indirect ceiling lighting (天花間接照明).
Bathroom with wood-look floor tiles (木紋地磚) and no clear glass separation for the shower, indicating '乾溼分離不足'.
A narrow kitchen featuring a standard I-shaped counter and upper/lower cabinets (標準一字型廚房, 空間偏窄).
Shows the entrance/hallway transition area leading into the master bedroom suite, characterized by the white polished tile floor (地面拋光磚).
The second view of the master bedroom, highlighting the large built-in wardrobe/storage unit (收納充足).
Bathroom featuring a visible window, confirming '衛浴2(含窗)' and '採光通風佳'.
Spacious bedroom (空間寬敞) with wood floor and a visible doorway leading directly to a bathroom (與衛浴距離近).
Spacious, square bedroom (空間方正) with wood floor and an attached double bed (已附雙人床).
Bedroom C view showing the medium-sized, slightly long layout (空間中等偏長) with a single bed (已附床組).
The complementary view of Bedroom C (Image 12), emphasizing the narrow and long structure (格局狹長但方正).
Bathroom with marble-patterned wall tiles (牆面大理石紋磁磚) and lack of dry/wet separation, assigned by exclusion from Image 9 and 5.
Utility room explicitly containing a large water tank (水塔) and pump (加壓馬達).
Ground floor space with a roll-up door facing the street (直接面臨街道) and a staircase leading upstairs, suitable for a garage or storefront.
